mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, job, TO_CHAR(hiredate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, sal FROM emp
SELECT fno,name,poster, rownum FROM (SELECT fno, name, poster FROM food_menupan WHERE type Like '%'||#{type}||'%' ORDER BY fno ASC) WHERE rownum<=20
SELECT empno,ename,job,dname,loc,grade FROM emp,dept,salgrade WHERE emp.deptno=dept.deptno AND sal BETWEEN losal AND hisal

SELECT empno,ename,job, (SELECT dname FROM dept WHERE deptno=emp.deptno) as dname, (SELECT loc FROM dept WHERE deptno=emp.deptno) as loc, (SELECT grade FROM salgrade WHERE emp.sal BETWEEN losal AND hisal) as grade FROM emp
